title: New Neutraface No. 2 and Specials from House Industries
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 8.Nov.2007 4.53am 

KEEP YOUR FORM AND YOUR FUNCTION.  
INTRODUCING NEUTRAFACE NO. 2

Neutraface No. 2 is an extension of the Neutra legacy, where form and function meet at the nexus of practicality and versatility. It is by no means intended as an improvement or replacement of the original Neutraface, but as an expansion of the original concept. Neutra’s highly sought-after residential and commercial designs have stood the test of time, as will the typography that bears his name.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612")

CLICK HERE TO SAVE BIG MONEY ON THE  
COMPLETE NEUTRAFACE COLLECTION!

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=619](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=619 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=619")

ALEXANDER GIRARD BLOCKS ARE IN STOCK!

Looking for the perfect holiday gift? Grab a set of these before they get snatched up in the rush to avoid Chinese-made toys. Made in the USA and printed with non-toxic inks!

[http://www.houseind.com/girard/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/www.houseind.com/girard/ "http://www.houseind.com/girard/")

SPEAKING OF THE HOLIDAYS...

...some new House33 gear is online.

[http://store.house33.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/store.house33.com/ "http://store.house33.com/")  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

VELLUM AND LACE

Who would spend way too much money to make a shapely board-style book draped with a pair of custom-branded Agent Provocateur knickers? House Industries, of course! This is a beautiful inside look at the Agent Provocateur logo project that’ll look just as good on your coffee table as it does in your underwear drawer.

[http://store.house33.com/knickers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211090259/http:/store.house33.com/knickers/ "http://store.house33.com/knickers/")
